warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Masters of physical combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor. The backbone of military forces and those who rely on strength and martial prowess.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Experts in stealth, agility, and cunning, often excelling in dexterous skills and unconventional approaches. Include skilled workers, scouts, and those who rely on finesse.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: Wielders of magical energies, specializing in spellcasting and arcane knowledge. Rare individuals capable of manipulating the fundamental forces of magic.

thieves.name: Thieves' Guild
thieves.description: Secretive organizations specializing in stealth, subterfuge, and illicit activities

mercenary.name: Mercenary Company
mercenary.description: Groups of professional soldiers for hire, skilled in various forms of combat and tactics

assassins.name: Assassins' Guild
assassins.description: Organizations specializing in covert operations, espionage, and targeted eliminations

artisan.name: Artisan Guild
artisan.description: Organizations of skilled craftsmen and creators, adept in various trades and arts

trader.name: Trader Guild
trader.description: Merchant organizations and commercial enterprises, from great trading houses to local market vendors

politician.name: Political Organization
politician.description: Governmental and diplomatic institutions, from royal courts to local councils

laborer.name: Labor Guild
laborer.description: Organizations of workers who perform manual labor and essential services to support society

academician.name: Academic Institution
academician.description: Centers of learning and knowledge, serving as keepers and transmitters of information

mages.name: Mages' Guild
mages.description: Organizations of spellcasters and magical practitioners, dedicated to the study and application of arcane arts

priest.name: Priest
priest.description: Divine spellcasters who draw power from deities to heal and protect. Mages with at least one of their foci in Light Magic. Priests and Clerics are often affiliated with religious institutions. Those who are not are known as healers or white mages.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Masters of unarmed combat and spiritual discipline

crusader.name: Crusader
crusader.description: Warriors who fight for an ideal, often justice and righteousness

lancer.name: Lancer
lancer.description: Specialists in polearms and spears, skilled in both mounted and foot combat with reach weapons

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.description: Spellcasters who derive their power from pacts with otherworldly beings, specializing in Spirit magic combined with either Light or Dark magic depending on their patron. They summon minor outsiders and maintain intelligent outsider familiars

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.description: Specialists in death magic, raising the dead and manipulating life forces

enchanter.name: Enchanter
enchanter.description: Focus on the manipulation of magical energies to imbue objects with spells

shadowblade.name: Shadowblade
shadowblade.description: Stealthy assassins who combine martial prowess with shadow magic

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Skilled hunters and trackers, adept with bows and nature magic

bard.name: Bard
bard.description: Specialists in a particular musical instrument or style, enhancing their magical abilities and charming others

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Guardians of nature who can shapeshift and command natural forces

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.description: Masters of life at sea, skilled in navigation, seamanship, and the ways of ports both foreign and domestic

beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
beastmaster.description: Specialists in Spirit magic who bond with and summon natural creatures, forming deep connections with the animal kingdom

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: Spiritual guides who commune with natural and ancestral spirits, serving as intermediaries between the physical and spirit worlds

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: Masters of planar conjuration who call forth powerful eidolons and dimensional beings through combined Spirit and Aether magic
